summary: This module implements a collection of generic class‑based views for Django's admindocs application. A shared base view supplies common request handling and context preparation, while concrete views generate index and detail pages for models, templates, template tags, template filters, and view functions, as well as a page offering bookmarklet scripts. The views introspect installed apps, URL configurations, and code objects to assemble documentation data for rendering in the admin interface.
business_intent: Enable staff users to browse automatically generated documentation of a project's models, templates, tags, filters, and view functions directly from the Django admin, facilitating code exploration, debugging, and learning without external tools.
